Based on the famous novel by Rudolfo Anaya, BLESS ME, LAST - The Healer is a turbulent history and transition about a young servant in New Mexico during World War II. When a curandera named Ultima goes to live with his family, Antonio experiences a series of mysterious and terrifying events that cause him to face questions about his own destiny and all the mystical powers of this woman.
